City Council of Crane, TX
=========================

![Berry Ingram - City of Crane Councilman](https://crane.texas.gov/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/C.-Lewis.jpg "C. Lewis")

#### Chris Lewis

### Councilman Ward #1

##### March 2022- Present

[Send Email](mailto:clewis@crane.texas.gov)

![Norma Pinedo - City of Crane Councilwoman](https://crane.texas.gov/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/Council_NormaPinedo.jpg "Council_NormaPinedo")

#### Norma Pinedo

### Councilwoman Ward #1

##### April 2000 to present

[Send Email](mailto:npinedo@crane.texas.gov)

“I love Crane! It has become my home. It is an honor to serve the community. The people of Crane are really great.”

![Manual Cadena Jr - City of Crane Councilman](https://crane.texas.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/Glenn-Anderson-rotated.jpg "Glenn Anderson")

#### Glenn Anderson

### Councilman Ward #2

##### October 2025- Present

[Send Email](mailto:ganderson@crane.texas.gov)
